PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-00592025-01-31ISED, NRC
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectNRC and RCEA - Administrative Support Group ** COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT **
PrecisOrder approving the ENTRY by National Research Council of Canada into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Research Council Employees’ Association that covers all employees in the ADMINISTRATIVE SUPPORT Group bargaining unit, for the period beginning on May 1, 2022 and ending on April 30, 2026.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving the ENTRY by National Research Council of Canada into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Research Council Employees’ Association that covers all employees in the ADMINISTRATIVE SUPPORT Group bargaining unit, for the period beginning on May 1, 2022 and ending on April 30, 2026.
